explains: adj. 茂盛的，郁郁葱葱的；豪华的，奢侈的；性感的，迷人的；（色彩，音乐）非常华丽的，赏心悦目的

sentences.en: In the cold winter, daffodil foliage is still lush, full of vitality, to bring people the spring.
sentences.cn: 在寒冷的冬天，水仙花依然枝叶繁茂，生机盎然，给人们送来了春意。

sentences.en: On one side stand new apartment buildings for civil servants, with luxury kitchens and a sprinkler system embedded in the lush lawn.
sentences.cn: 一边是林立的为公务员修建的新公寓，它们有奢华的厨房、埋入茂盛草坪的洒水系统。

sentences.en: The hills are covered in lush green vegetation.
sentences.cn: 这片丘岭草木茂盛，郁郁葱葱。
